title: Himi 410
lyrics:
7.7.7.7.loua
1.
Sīsū, he Taulanga ū
Ki he kāinga fai folau,
Mālō pe ho’ ofi mai
Ki he potu fa’a matang
i
.
Ko e tahi fa’a peau
a
,
‘Ita pea ma’olung
a
;
Ko e maama kovi en
i
,
Fakatanga ‘a e lelei.
2.
‘Oku fa’a matangi tō
Hoto loto fakapō.
Vilingi
a
‘a hoto vak
a
‘I he holi ‘o e mat
a
.
Holi ‘a kakano fok
i
,
‘Ikai tuku ‘ene o’
i
;
Ngoto pe ‘etau mo’u
i
‘I he ngāue ‘a ‘Afung
i
.
3.
Sīsū, ‘ofa he folau
Tōmohopo he peau.
‘Ai ke laolao mu’
a
,
‘O tokoni mai mei ‘uta,
‘Ai ke vave ‘eku hū
Ki he potu ‘oku ū:
‘Oua na’a ku toe hē,
Kau folau ‘i namo pē.
4.
Ta’etaa
u
‘a hoku vak
a
Mo e fu’u folau ‘i vah
a
;
Ko e vaka vaivai fu’u,
Taau pe ke fai he ū.
Pea kapau ‘e fou kitu’
a
,
‘Ao pe ke vaka u
a
.
Sīsū, ofi ‘ia au,
Lolotonga ‘a e folau.*
